This double stand 8.5 quart clear plastic beverage dispenser is perfect for all juices and chilled non-carbonated beverages. A removable beverage container and drip tray make clean-up quick and easy, and individual ice core centers keep beverages cold without diluting the taste. This 8.5 quart double stand beverage dispenser is sure to be an instant hit, with its clear plastic construction and attractive 18-8 stainless steel finish. Great for hotels, continental breakfast bars, and upscale catering events. Please Note: Do not freeze the ice cores. They are designed to be filled with cubed or crushed ice. You just can't party hearty without ample hydration, and this dispenser keeps the libations flowing. The clear container helps guests keep track of the good times and lets the host know when the beer or mojitos are running low. An interior ice chamber keeps drinks cold without watery dilution. Exclusively from RedEnvelope. black and clear plastic natural wood handle is reminiscent of a bar tap and may be personalized with three initials holds 84 oz. 9" x 20 1/2"H Less RedEnvelope 993 store reviews See Store Info /personalized-beverage/9J4ijCpvr7ESAAek5rgtyQ==/info $49.95 +$9.99 shipping Visit Store Ovobar Eco-Design Beverage Dispenser with Bamboo Base - Frontgate Ovobar Eco-Design Beverage Dispenser with Bamboo Base - Frontgate ( In stock ) The Ovobar unit combines the unique shape of an egg and the thermal properties of porcelain to preserve and revitalize liquid, and contains no BPA. Durable and elegant porcelain ceramic,... More
The Ovobar unit combines the unique shape of an egg and the thermal properties of porcelain to preserve and revitalize liquid, and contains no BPA. Durable and elegant porcelain ceramic, chrome-plated brass and glass construction create a purer environment of filtration than non-organic materials like plastic and contains no BPA. Sleek curves and the absence of right angles allow water to flow freely and naturally, preventing stagnation and reducing the risk of bacteria buildup. Some assembly. Holds 2.9 gallons. The unique shape of our handmade Ovobar Eco-Design Beverage Dispenser with Bamboo Base from Aquaovo was inspired by the work of water research pioneers. Its award-winning ovoid design eases the circulation and regeneration of liquids, and it can be used to dispense water, iced tea, wine, or cocktails. . . . . . Extended manufacturer's warranty . Clean once a month with warm water and mild soap . Imported. Whether for a party, outdoor entertaining, or every day use, this beautiful beverage dispenser is the way to go all year-round! The hexagon shape holds the pitcher firmly in place on the elegant wrought iron stand so the spigot is always in the right place. Chromed plastic spigot has no lead risk unlike brass. Perfect for serving iced tea, lemonade, and other iced beverages. Or fill the jug with exotic tropical fruit juices or punch, or even sangria! You can even keep ice water readily available on your kitchen counter with this beauty. Holds appx 6 liters (1-1/2 gallons) and the wide top makes refilling easy.
